scripts.build: npm run clean && babel server --out-dir build --presets=es2015,react,stage-0 && ./node_modules/.bin/webpack
scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/server.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon --exec babel-node --presets=es2015,react,stage-0 ./server/server.js --watch server
scripts.test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --compilers js:babel-register --require babel-polyfill --recursive server/**/*.spec.js
